description: React component for a Mock Tests page, including listing tests, filtering, taking tests, tracking progress, and displaying results.

methods.name: safeParseJson
methods.description: Safely parses JSON string, returns fallback on error.

methods.name: resetFilters
methods.description: Resets category and difficulty filters to default values.

methods.name: clampIndex
methods.description: Clamps index within valid range for questions.

methods.name: computeScore
methods.description: Calculates the score based on answers and correct answers.

methods.name: ensureTestProgressInitialized
methods.description: Initializes progress state for a given test if not already present.

methods.name: startOrResumeTest
methods.description: Starts or resumes a test by setting activeTestId.

methods.name: setAnswerForActive
methods.description: Sets the answer for a question in the active test.

methods.name: goToQuestion
methods.description: Navigates to a specific question index.

methods.name: submitActiveTest
methods.description: Marks the active test as completed and calculates score.

methods.name: resetTest
methods.description: Resets progress for a specific test.

methods.name: exitToList
methods.description: Exits the test-taking view back to the list of tests.

methods.name: formatStatus
methods.description: Returns a string representing the progress status.

methods.name: countAnswered
methods.description: Counts the number of answered questions.

methods.name: getDifficultyBadgeStyle
methods.description: Returns style object for difficulty badge.

methods.name: getCategoryBadgeStyle
methods.description: Returns style object for category badge.
